member.name: POLICY_DNS_DOMAIN_INFO
member.summary: The POLICY_DNS_DOMAIN_INFO structure is used to set and query Domain Name System (DNS) information about the primary domain associated with a Policy object. The and functions use this structure when their InformationClass parameters are set to PolicyDnsDomainInformation.

member.name: POLICY_DNS_DOMAIN_INFO.Name
member.summary: An structure that specifies the name of the primary domain. This is the same as the primary domain name in the structure.

member.name: POLICY_DNS_DOMAIN_INFO.DnsDomainName
member.summary: An structure that specifies the DNS name of the primary domain.

member.name: POLICY_DNS_DOMAIN_INFO.DnsForestName
member.summary: An structure that specifies the DNS forest name of the primary domain. This is the DNS name of the domain at the root of the enterprise.

member.name: POLICY_DNS_DOMAIN_INFO.DomainGuid
member.summary: A structure that contains the GUID of the primary domain.

member.name: POLICY_DNS_DOMAIN_INFO.Sid
member.summary: Pointer to the SID of the primary domain. This is the same as the primary domain SID in the structure.
